column1: Gender field blinking appearance after Config change "false"
column71:
1. Open, log in and read Config Data Prod *Profile* section -  "Gender", Mertial_statuse"

Email - configurationdata@gmail.com
Pass - Configuration_0101

2.In Config Data Prod. Profile section “*Gender*” - “*true*” change to “*false*”

Click *Save*

3. Open Qwallity app *user_action* page  [https://qwallity-prod.onrender.com/user_action|https://qwallity-prod.onrender.com/user_action]

and loge in as **non* *admin user

4.Compare Config Data Prod. with Qwallity app Payment type 



*Expected result* - In Profile page after changing *gender* config to "*false*" the field should be *disappeared*
*Actually result* - The Gender field *blinking* (*appears* a *second*) only then disappeared

1. Open, log in and read Config Data Prod Payment type -  ", "Credit Card"

Email - configurationdata@gmail.com
Pass - Configuration_0101

2. Open Qwallity app user_action page  [https://qwallity-prod.onrender.com/user_action|https://qwallity-prod.onrender.com/user_action]

and loge in as *non* admin user

3.Compare Config Data Prod. with Qwallity app Payment type 

*Expected result* - In Payment type drop down menu should be "*Credit card"* payment type


*Actually result* -  In Payment type drop down menu there are "*Cash*" and "*Credit card"* payment type
                             according to the Config Data Prod there shouldn't be "Cash" payment type as it is *not* 
                             *mentioned* in Config Data Prod.

1. Open, log in and read Config Data Prod Payment type -  ", Credit Card"

Email - configurationdata@gmail.com
Pass - Configuration_0101

2.In Config Data Prod *Payment type* section add “*Cash*” 

3.and *delete* “Credit Card”

4.Click *Save* 

5. Open Qwallity app **user_action* *page via *link*

[https://qwallity-prod.onrender.com/user_action|https://qwallity-prod.onrender.com/user_action]

and loge in as *non* admin user

6. Click *Payment type* drop down menu to see the type
7. Config Data **Payment type* *Compare with *Qwallity* *app* Payment type 



*Expected result* - In Payment type drop down menu should be "*Cash"* payment type only


*Actually result* -   In Payment type drop down menu there are "*Cash*" and "*Credit* *card*" payment type according to the 

                               Config Data Prod there shouldn't be "Credit card" payment type as it was deleted in Config Data Prod but 

                                config doesn’t affect on Qwallity app Payment type section.
